CustomField.description: Takes ISA savings value at any frequency and returns monthly
CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( ISAs_Frequency__c , "Weekly"), 52*ISAs__c/12, IF(ISPICKVAL(ISAs_Frequency__c, "Monthly"), ISAs__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(ISAs_Frequency__c, "Annually"), ISAs__c/12,0)))
CustomField.label: ISA saving (monthly)
